issue.title: [PDTS] Copying equivalent paths effects not specified

discussion.p: Even if to and from are different paths, they may be equivalent.

issue.resolution:
Specify what happens if (options & copy_options::overwrite_existing) but from and to resolve to the same file.
[Beman Dawes: 9 Feb 2014: Need advice on this issue:]
What do existing implentations do?
Possible resolutions:
Treat it as an error.
Once equivalence is determined, take no further action and return true? false?
Don't bother to detect a file overwriting itself. This will likely result in an error, anyhow.
